challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .divider selector should have a border-bottom property set to 1px solid #888989.
Your .divider selector should have a margin property set to 2px 0.

description: Create a selector for your new .divider and set the border-bottom property to 1px solid #888989. Also give it a top and bottom margin of 2px. It should not have any left or right margin.
